sqlMap.select: select * from a$value$sf libro where TIMESTAMP < sysdate - 2/24 and NOT EXISTS (SELECT X.FDRID FROM a$value$xf X WHERE X.FLDID=1001 AND TO_CHAR(X.TEXT) = 'S' and X.FDRID=libro.FDRID )
select id as idpage,name as nombre from A$idLibro$PAGEH where name not like '%.csig' and name not like '%.xsig' and FDRID = #idRegistro#
